comment: The content is a lot (seriously) for this class. The basic course format is to build a portfolio website that showcases the technology projects you completed. Each project and portfolio page has guidelines that must be followed to get the max points for a project. Feedback and grades are given and students can resubmit for improvement points.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework--Online Savvy

comment: There is no reason we shouldn't have been working on the Weebly in class. There was way too much homework because of her refusal to do this. She also changed her attendance policy on the LAST DAY OF CLASS. She said you could miss 2 days for free, but then took of points for every absence instead. It was also out of 300 points for some reason.

This class has been one of the only classes in the education program I have learned nothing in. We spend class periods making pointless PowerPoints, videos etc. She grades super random almost as if she picks your grade out of the hat. I do not recommend taking her unless you have time to redo your assignments 20 times for a good grade.

She is ok. She is nice and cares about your grade. However, be ready to be told the sections you turn in are "weak" and receive poor grades. She gives you a chance to resubmit many times and build your grade up but it is very exhausting and annoying to work hard on something only to receive a 40 and be told it is weak.
She is very rude and emotional! She is also not understanding and provides horrible feedback. The work load is huge! You will regret it if you take her.

She's very snarky and rude! She'll provide feedback on your assignments, telling you to change it and if you do it she'll say you didn't? Of the three years that I've been at KSU I have never encountered a more emotionally incompetent professor than Professor Booker. Best part about her class? It ends.

Professor Booker was one of the hardest graders I have ever dealt with! She would call you out and take points off anything. Even though the content was great, the work load was ridiculous. She did allow you to fix your mistakes, but didn't always give you the credit. She is also very rude all the time. At least she is retiring!

professor Booker is the rudest professor I have ever taken. If you email her asking for help on anything, respond a smart ass response as well as a lot of attitude. I would never recommend her to anyone!! At least shes retiring!

Dr. Booker is a wonderful professor. This class is very long and has a lot of outside work, but she is willing to work with you to get you the best possible grade. She makes everything so clear and will help you in any way possible.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Clear grading criteria

comment: This woman... I don't know if its the retirement coming up, but every class it felt like walking on eggshells. She can turn so quickly and yell at the class. It is very obvious when she is in a bad mood. She talks a lot and some of the in-class activities seem like a waste since there is so much graded homework.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Dr. Booker is amazing and she knows her technology. There is a ton a material because you are creating your Weebly account and a Blog. She moves fast because you have a lot to create. She is a wonderful professor!

I wish I took this class as a summer class. The workload is a lot but she is very loose on deadlines. She really wants you to get an A in the class so if you ever make a mistake on an assignment she lets you fix it. She HATES cell phones so make sure you are never on your cell phone. She is also very lecture heavy.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Lecture heavy--Accessible outside class

comment: She is ok, but she definitely has her days. She cannot stand cell phones and will call you out for using one or talking. But she is helpful and teaches the concept of technology in the classroom very well. I would take her again if I had to. The work is not hard there is just soooo much of it.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: OMG! I can't say enough about Dr. Booker! She is the best professor I have had at Kennesaw State. Kind, caring, knowledgeable, comes in on her own time to work with her students. She really wants to see you succeed in her class. I LOVE HER !!!!!!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: Dr. Booker is a sweetheart and cares so much about all her students! This class was a lot more work than I thought it would be and you have to be pretty self-disciplined, but Dr. Booker is lenient about turning things in late and guides you. Although you have to create a lot of lesson plans, this class was very fun and Ms. Booker's awesome!

This class has a ton of assignments but Dr. Booker walks you through everything and is available outside of class for help. She's really funny and makes class enjoyable. I would suggest taking this over the summer as opposed to fall or spring semester.

I absolutely LOVE Professor Booker. There is a lot of content in this course but she makes it fun and you will truly learn a lot from her course. She will allow you to correct any mistakes you make on your assignments and she truly wants you to be successful. I am going to miss her class. I definitely recommend taking her!
She is the best teacher I've had at KSU! The stuff you will learn in this class is really useful and the weekly is a good tool to put on resumes. You'll love this class!

She was awesome. This class is a Lot of work, but it's only one day a week. She is wonderful- her classes are so much fun and she's a gem. She was clear about her instruction and more than willing to answer questions. She never made you feel stupid and she was more than willing to work with you if there was ever an issue. She WANTS you to pass.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Booker was amazing. She gives you the entire semester to complete assignments but do not wait- there are a lot of them, and they are very time-consuming. I came away from the class feeling so much more prepared to successfully integrate technology into my future classroom.
This professor is amazing!! She is so sweet and will do whatever she can to get you your A. Lots of assignments but plenty of opportunity for extra help. TAKE HER!! You won't regret it!

Loved Booker! She was so helpful, and gives great feedback! If she counts off, she will tell you exactly what you need to fix. This class took some time, but you could do work in class. Go to class to get participation points! It counts a ton towards your grade. Great professor,great class, and I would definitely take her again!

She is amazing! Very sweet lady. The class is a lot of work but manageable. She works with students on due dates and will make adjustments throughout the semester. Make sure you have access to a Windows computer to take this class. You'll need to download a lot of software. This class really is amazing and the teacher is even better! Oh and no txbk

Professor Booker was so nice. She's a little crazy but in a good, funny kind of way. She's really patient and doesn't count it against you if the technology simply doesn't work. She gives a few work days to give you some time to catch up. I really loved her class, it was definitely one of my most fun classes I had all semester.
